## Task

From the R package fpp2 in R, load the quarterly beer production data in Australia. plot the time series plot of the data find the trend, seasonality, and noise of the quarterly beer production

```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(fpp2)
library(tidyverse)

df <- window(ausbeer, start = 1992)
```

```{r}
autoplot(df) + xlab("Year") + ylab("Megalitres")
```

```{r}
autoplot(decompose(df)) + xlab("Year")
```

```{r}
fit.beer <- tslm(df ~ trend + season)
summary(fit.beer)
```
